const sum = (workhard = true) => {
  return (workhard
    ? ([][[]] + [])[+!![]] + ([] + {})[!+[] + !![]]
    : (!(~+[]) + {})[--[~+""][+[]] * [~+[]] + ~~!+[]] + ({} + [])[[~!+[]] * ~+[]])
}
const study = 1, work = 1
const you = sum(study + work)
